content: nivosa hat by anya hawkins nivosa hat is a unisex wintery colorwork hat made with a dk weight yarn with two highly contrasting colors four adult sizes presented in a pattern ensure that you will be able to get a perfect fit for a desired look this hat has a great potential for experimenting with colors you can use light background as shown in a sample and get classical wintery feel or you can reverse it and make it dark with striking light snowflakes even the largest size doesn t take a lot of yarn in any color so you can use this hat as a stash buster this pattern has a complete video tutorial to help you along in this pattern you also have an opportunity to learn how to make a faux fur pompom it is very easy with a help of another video tutorial there is also a tutorial for a fleece lining for a hat if you have sensitive skin on your forehead or just don t want to have an imprint of a ribbing after wearing a hat or if your winter is too cold and windy for a knitted hat give it a try the links for the video tutorial for lining and for making a faux fur pompom are provided sample on photo is in size m on a model with a 21 8 54 5 cm head in circumference all photographs except the one on the title page are unprintable in order to save ink the title page is not essential and may be left out when printing © anya hawkins 2025 for pattern support contact
